name: The Weather Sunny Canvas
text:
You can only control 1 "Sunny Weathery Pattern". "Weathery" Effect Monsters in your Main Monster Zone in the same column as this card, and Main Monster Zones adjacent to that zone, gain this effect.
â—? (Quick Effect): You can banish this card, then target 1 monster you control; Tribute that target, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Weathery" monster from your hand or GY with a different name from that monster.
